on_insert.sql: DO $$ DECLARE V_TRIGGER_NAME VARCHAR2(100) := ''GLOBAL_CPY_PREFIXES_IOF''; BEGIN IF TRUE THEN INSERT INTO V_GLOBAL_CPY_PREFIXES ( GS1_COMP_PREFIX_NO, GS1_ORG_COUNTRY_CD, GCP_OWNER_COMP_CD, GTIN_ALLOC_TYPE_PRIM_CD, GTIN_ALLOC_TYPE_SEC_CD, GTIN_ALLOC_TYPE_TER_CD, SSCC_RELEVANCY_IND, GLOBAL_CHANGE_ID, REASON_FOR_CHANGE, VALID_IND ) VALUES ( :NEW.GS1_COMP_PREFIX_NO, :NEW.GS1_ORG_COUNTRY_CD, :NEW.GCP_OWNER_COMP_CD, :NEW.GTIN_ALLOC_TYPE_PRIM_CD, :NEW.GTIN_ALLOC_TYPE_SEC_CD, :NEW.GTIN_ALLOC_TYPE_TER_CD, :NEW.SSCC_RELEVANCY_IND, :NEW.GLOBAL_CHANGE_ID, :NEW.REASON_FOR_CHANGE, :NEW.VALID_IND ); END IF; END; $$ LANGUAGE plpgsql;

on_update.sql: DO $$ DECLARE V_TRIGGER_NAME VARCHAR2(100) := ''GLOBAL_CPY_PREFIXES_IOF''; BEGIN IF TRUE THEN IF :NEW.GS1_COMP_PREFIX_NO <> :OLD.GS1_COMP_PREFIX_NO THEN RAISE EXCEPTION ERR_UPD; END IF; UPDATE V_GLOBAL_CPY_PREFIXES SET GS1_ORG_COUNTRY_CD = :NEW.GS1_ORG_COUNTRY_CD, GCP_OWNER_COMP_CD = :NEW.GCP_OWNER_COMP_CD, GTIN_ALLOC_TYPE_PRIM_CD = :NEW.GTIN_ALLOC_TYPE_PRIM_CD, GTIN_ALLOC_TYPE_SEC_CD = :NEW.GTIN_ALLOC_TYPE_SEC_CD, GTIN_ALLOC_TYPE_TER_CD = :NEW.GTIN_ALLOC_TYPE_TER_CD, SSCC_RELEVANCY_IND = :NEW.SSCC_RELEVANCY_IND, GLOBAL_CHANGE_ID = :NEW.GLOBAL_CHANGE_ID, REASON_FOR_CHANGE = :NEW.REASON_FOR_CHANGE, VALID_IND = :NEW.VALID_IND WHERE GS1_COMP_PREFIX_NO = :NEW.GS1_COMP_PREFIX_NO; END IF; END; $$ LANGUAGE plpgsql;

on_delete.sql: DO $$ DECLARE V_TRIGGER_NAME VARCHAR2(100) := ''GLOBAL_CPY_PREFIXES_IOF''; BEGIN IF TRUE THEN RAISE EXCEPTION ERR_DEL; END IF; END; $$ LANGUAGE plpgsql;
